page.title: 15Living near the sea
page.content: I like living here because the beach is down the road and when it is nice I can just go for a swim.In the summer lots of holiday makers come down and drive very fast on the roads and they are very narrow with sharp corners.The beach at Cadgwith is small with quite a lot of sand when the tide is out.There is a big rock that people sit on and jump off when the tide is in.My dad is a fisherman and his boat is at Cadgwith.He goes out most days in the week.Sometimes he goes out every day.When he goes early he goes about 4.30 to 6.30a.m.In the summer I go and do the store pots with him.We go early and get back about 9p.m.His boat is 25ft.It has a wheel house. It has FH on its number which stands for Falmouth Harbour.There are six or seven boats from Falmouth and lots of punts and smaller fishing boats.
